markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">[Implosion](/Spells.aspx?ID=162)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 346 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 corporeal creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You crush the target by causing it to collapse in on itself, dealing 75 damage. The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you must choose a new target to be subject to the same effect; the same creature can never be targeted more than once with a single casting of this spell. You also can't affect more than one creature per turn with _implosion_. You can't target a creature that's [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222), gaseous, or liquid, or otherwise lacking a solid form.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 10.
name: Implosion

summary: Make a creature collapse in on itself.
summary_markdown: Make a creature collapse in on itself.
text: Implosion Source Core Rulebook pg. 346 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Bloodline Demonic Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 corporeal creature Saving Throw basic Fortitude Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You crush the target by causing it to collapse in on itself, dealing 75 damage. The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you must choose a new target to be subject to the same effect; the same creature can never be targeted more than once with a single casting of this spell. You also can't affect more than one creature per turn with implosion . You can't target a creature that's incorporeal, gaseous, or liquid, or otherwise lacking a solid form. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 10.
